title: Action Heroes Archives Vol. 1
description: Before the Creeper, before Hawk and Dove, even before co-creating Spider-Man, one-of-a-kind comic book artist/writer Steve Ditko illustrated his first super hero; the Cold War adventures of the nuclear-powered CAPTAIN ATOM. Readers and fans now have a chance to own all the Charlton Comics' appearances of the original hero.
author: Joe Gill
